title: IAA Tonight | Kyler Murray's Study Clause Has Been Removed
description: The Arizona Cardinals have removed the independent study addendum from Kyler Murray's contract after it received significant backlash. Is it too little too late? Plus, Kirk Cousins keeps securing the bag despite Vikings General Manager Kwesi Adofo-Mensah sneak diss towards the QB saying he's not the caliber of Patrick Mahomes or Tom Brady. Should Cousins be concerned about his future in Minnesota? Leger Douzable, Omar Kelly, and Brandon Flowers discuss!
author: smanderville@houseofathlete.com (Leger Douzable, Omar Kelly, Brandon Flowers)
